name: Who Wants To Wake Up Dead?
name_original: Who Wants To Wake Up Dead?
description:
Game created for the mini game jam 61: Egypt with two conflicting ideas.

Story

Doctor Frank wakes up from a nightmare, looks around and discovers that he's not on his 3 star Cairo's hotel!

He then hears a strange cheering behind a door, looks like he is inside a pyramid but crowded?

When Doctor Frank passes the door he is welcomed by the host of the show, God Seth!

He must answer to all questions in the game in time and correctly so he wakes up alive in his hotel room again.

Controls

Only mouse.

Limitation

The conflicting ideas are the fact that it is a ancient god as the host of a questions show

Known Bugs

On the web version of the game the assets for the background and floor are not tiling correctly. But the executable (at least the macOS one) is working fine.
